snippet: Aiming to compete with LinkedIn, independent developers of new apps are trying to add a professional information layer to Facebook.
abstract: Randall Stross, Digital Domain column, observes Independent developers of new apps, aiming to compete with LinkedIn, are trying to add a professional information layer to Facebook.
lead_paragraph: Aiming to compete with LinkedIn, independent developers of new apps are trying to add a professional information layer to Facebook.

headline.seo: BranchOut and BeKnown Vie for LinkedIn’s Reach
headline.main: Sifting the Professional From the Personal
headline.print_headline: Sifting the Professional From the Personal
